casebody.data:
John KENNEY, James Brewer, and Tammy Bell, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
Daniel P. BOSS, Boss Cogo, LLC, and Boss Engineering Company, Defendants-Appellants,
and
Ventura Capital, LLC, Defendant. SC: 156618
COA: 331905 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the July 18, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
